level.heading: USES AS A MATTER OF RIGHT (C-4) (ยง 11-751)

level.text: The conversion of gross floor area in an existing structure from above ground parking to any use permitted in the C-4 District shall be permitted in a C-4 District as a matter of right; provided:
The amount of area to be converted shall not exceed a floor area ratio of one (1.0);
The parking to be eliminated shall not be parking required under the provisions of this title; and
The area to be converted shall meet the requirements of all applicable codes and regulations of the District of Columbia for the proposed use.
The following uses also shall be permitted in a C-4 District as a matter of right:
Any use permitted in a C-3 District under ยง 741;
Gasoline service station subject to the provisions of chapter 23 of this title; and
Other similar service or retail use, including assemblage and repair clearly incidental to the conduct of a permitted service or retail establishment on the premises.
